title: Five-Star Top-Rated Beachfront St. Lucia Villa Retreat with Private Marina & Four Pools
description: Elegant island paradise awaits with a five-star stay at The Landings Resort and Spa, a boutique oasis surrounded by the breathtaking majesty of St. Lucia’s picture-perfect Rodney Bay.  Each of The Landings' 85 bespoke villas radiates timeless Caribbean sophistication, backed by a dazzling array of facilities - dine across five vibrant restaurants and bars, laze by any of the four shimmering pools, savour every minute on the resort’s flawless beachfront or indulge with a visit to the resort's massive spa.
offer_address: Pigeon Island Causeway,  Rodney Bay, Gros Islet, St Lucia
